analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/9/0xf3bcbaac4d699bd81e75e35fe01c695739b0903c.sol:
	Contract YAMMY has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/9/0xf3bcbaac4d699bd81e75e35fe01c695739b0903c.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/9/0xf3bcbaac4d699bd81e75e35fe01c695739b0903c.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
